Room.Name: Hafnia Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the eastern side of the circle drive around Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: People whisper that there is a thieve's guild in one of the alleys near here. It might be true, since the city patrol has picked up a number of inept pickpockets in this area who appeared to be practicing. They say the guild runs a school for pickpockets, and a more advanced school for burglers.
